name: Extreme Mad Fighter
description:
Extreme Mad Fighter

This Game about mad Fighter ..... He become mad because at last Final Fighting match he loss that fight. Now he can't handle this failure. Now he is very frustrated & angry. It randomly mover in this city and destroy every this like Car,house,tree etc... He is continuously running in city and destroy every thing.

Key Features

-> Attractive 3D Model

-> Smooth Game

-> 3D Views

-> Easy Controlling
